first_para: Sir Roger James Gale (born 20 August 1943) is a British Conservative politician who has served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Thanet in Kent since 1983.

full.extract: Sir Roger James Gale (born 20 August 1943) is a British Conservative politician who has served as the Member of Parliament (MP) for North Thanet in Kent since 1983.
full.title: Roger Gale
